meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>luggage</kanji> <kanji>tag</kanji> is a <vocabulary>tag</vocabulary> you put on luggage. It's also a <vocabulary>label</vocabulary> you can put on a package before you send it, like a <vocabulary>shipping label</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This word uses the kun'yomi reading for both kanji. You've learned both of these readings already, so you should be able to read this word too.
